org.freehep.graphics2d

Class PrintColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Color
      • org.freehep.graphics2d.PrintColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Paint, Transparency, Serializable

    public class PrintColor
extends Color
    Print color for printing and display in color, grayscale and black/white.
    Version:
    $Id: freehep-graphics2d/src/main/java/org/freehep/graphics2d/PrintColor.java 9c0688d78e6b 2007/01/30 23:58:16 duns $
    Author:
    Mark Donszelmann
    See Also:
